pages.text: Since 5%, after each 15% of paranormal exposure reached you will receive a point of power, that you can use to receive a $(l)paranormal power/$. But, to acquire a power, you must fulfill all of it's requirements, shown at the end of the description that appears when hovering over the power's icon.

pages.title: Navigation
pages.text: Right click on a transcendance altar and click the sigil button below the attributes, this will open up the powers screen. In it, you can navigate through the elements by clicking on the buttons on the left, and you can also drag the screen to see other powers.

pages.title: Requisites
pages.text: The requisites for a power can be the following:$(br)$(li)A minimum level of exposure;$(li)Minimum attributes;$(li)Other paranormal powers;$(li)Affinity with a certain element.$(p)If you don't meet a power's requirements, it's icon will appear greyed out and more transparent than the others.

Once you meet a power's requirements, have enough power points and are ready to transcend, you are able to receive the power by simply clicking on it's icon. When doing this, you'll notice a frame will appear on the icon, showing that the power is already owned.
